title: Ericsson security advisory (AV25-691)
description: Between September 25 and October 13, 2025, Ericsson published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Ericsson Indoor Connect 8855  versions prior to 2025.Q2
Ericcson Network Manager  versions prior to 25.1 and 25.2
RAN Compute (all BB versions)  versions prior to 24.Q1.C5
Site Controller 6610  versions prior to S24.Q2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
